name: Magnolia Oil & Gas Corporation
description: Magnolia Oil & Gas Corporation is a dynamic exploration and production company focused on the acquisition and development of oil and natural gas reserves in the United States. Founded in 2017 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Magnolia operates primarily in the Eagle Ford Shale region of South Texas, where it has established a significant presence. The company is committed to optimizing its asset base through innovative drilling techniques and advanced technology to maximize production and operational efficiency. Magnolia's strategic focus includes balancing growth with financial discipline, allowing it to generate sustainable cash flow and return capital to shareholders. The company emphasizes environmental stewardship and strives to operate safely and responsibly, adhering to the highest standards of environmental and corporate governance. With a robust portfolio of producing wells and a strong inventory of drilling locations, Magnolia Oil & Gas is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for energy while maintaining a commitment to sustainability.

seo.meta_title: Magnolia Oil & Gas Corporation | Energy Company
seo.meta_description: Explore Magnolia Oil & Gas Corporation, an innovative exploration and production company focused on oil and natural gas reserves in the United States. Discover their commitment to sustainability and operational excellence.

faq.question: What does Magnolia Oil & Gas do?
faq.answer: Magnolia Oil & Gas is focused on the exploration and production of oil and natural gas reserves, primarily in the Eagle Ford Shale region.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Magnolia Oil & Gas?
faq.answer: Stephen A. Chazen is the CEO of Magnolia Oil & Gas Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Magnolia Oil & Gas headquartered?
faq.answer: Magnolia Oil & Gas is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: When was Magnolia Oil & Gas founded?
faq.answer: Magnolia Oil & Gas was founded in 2017.
